original_text: We are not trying again to make you think that our work is good. But we do want to give you the chance to be proud of us. Then you will be able to show the false teachers that they are wrong. They are proud about what they look like on the outside. They do not think about what they are really like inside themselves.
korean_text: 우리가 다시 너희에게 자천하는 것이 아니요 오직 우리로 말미암아 자랑할 기회를 너희에게 주어 마음으로 하지 않고 외모로 자랑하는 자들에게 대답하게 하려 하는 것이라

sentences.original_text: to make you think that our work is good
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 일이 좋다고 당신이 생각하게 하려는 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: But we do want to give you the chance
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 당신에게 기회를 주고 싶습니다

sentences.original_text: Then you will be able to show
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 보여줄 수 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: the false teachers that they are wrong
They are proud about what they look like
what they are really like inside themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 내면에 정말로 어떤 모습인지에 대해서는
